wikipedia_page.main: Madeleine Hope Dodds known as M. Hope Dodds (2 January 1885 – 13 May 1972) was an English author and historian who wrote The Pilgrimage of Grace 1536–1537, and the Exeter Conspiracy, 1538.  She had three sisters and one brother, their parents were Edwin and Emily Dodds. She and two of her sisters founded the Little Theatre Gateshead.
